text: Richard Ringer (born 27 February 1989 in Überlingen) is a German athlete specialising in the long-distance and cross-country running. He won the bronze medal at the 2013 Summer Universiade. In addition, he finished fourth at the 2014 European Championships and fifth at the 2015 European Indoor Championships. ==Competition record== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2007 |European Junior
